name: ssb beanie
notes:
**s**tar **s**pangled **b**anner? or **s**ubmersible **s**hip **b**allistic (aka submarine)?
you choose!

whether you knit the ssb beanie in red, white & blue or choose your favorite color combination, we hope you enjoy our free pattern!

nautilus 1954 is a community of knitters and crocheters that have taken the mission to express gratitude and love to our united states navy submarine fleet through handknit & crocheted wool hats.

find us on facebook (nautilus1954) & instagram (@nautilus_1954), email woolhats@nautilus1954.com for more information and join our ravelry group [nautilus 1954](/groups/nautilus-1954).
